title: Bozoma Saint John on Branding, AI's Impact, Super Bowl
description: Bozoma Saint John, former Chief Marketing Offiver of Netflix and former chief brand officer of Uber, discusses the tech and media landscape and the Super Bowl with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close. She says evolution is key to everything. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Bozoma Saint John, former Chief Marketing Offiver of Netflix and former chief brand officer of Uber, discusses the tech and media landscape and the Super Bowl with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close. She says evolution is key to everything. (Source: Bloomberg)
